name: Manipulator Of Figure
description:
Description

Manipulator Of Figure - this is an interesting logic game using physics. Your task is to deliver the green circle to the purple platform and keep it there for 2 seconds. To do this, you can move the fugures that have physical properties. The difficulty is that you can move the green circle only by acting on it with other objects. Also, you need to think through the way in which you will deliver the circle to the platform. Can you be a master of figures?

Features:

- interesting gameplay

- various levels

- tasks requiring logical thinking

-minimalistic graphics

-pleasant music
